thread.title: Twitter Names Dorsey Permanent CEO, to Remain CEO of Square
thread.title_full: Twitter Names Dorsey Permanent CEO, to Remain CEO of Square - Bloomberg Business

author: Brian Womack
title: Twitter Names Dorsey Permanent CEO, to Remain CEO of Square
text:
Twitter Inc. named co-founder Jack Dorsey as chief executive officer, betting its co-founder and former leader will be able to revive fortunes at a social-media company that failed to impress investors following its 2013 initial public offering.
Dorsey, 38, will also keep his job as CEO of mobile-payments company Square Inc., the payments and financial services company he co-founded in 2009, Twitter said Monday in a filing.
Jack Dorsey
Photographer: Justin Tallis/AFP/Getty Images The pick may make it easier to restore confidence at Twitter amid management turmoil and slowing growth; Dorsey has already been involved in its operations as interim chief. Still, it indicates that the board failed to find a CEO that could be fully dedicated to addressing Twitterâ€™s issues.
The social-media company hired Spencer Stuart in June to run the search and has considered candidates including former Cisco Systems Inc. executive Padmasree Warrior and CBS Interactive Inc. President Jim Lanzone, people familiar with the matter have said.
